year_1_description: Temples built during the Chandela dynasty showcasing detailed erotic sculptures.
year_2_description: Tourist attraction with conservation concerns and fading artisan knowledge.
year_3_description: Digitally preserved via 3D scanning and virtual tours, artist schools revived.

year_1_description: Chola dynasty temples at their architectural peak.
year_2_description: Popular tourist sites, some damage due to weathering and crowds.
year_3_description: Climate-resilient restoration and cultural education zones established.

year_1_description: Sundarbans thriving with indigenous traditions and biodiversity.
year_2_description: Climate change and illegal tourism threatening cultural ecology.
year_3_description: Community-led ecotourism and restoration efforts active.
